
h1. Web Pages Management

The important function of site management is to manage all pages on a site and all sites. eXo WCM supports this function with all actions for webmasters such as create, delete, edit in one place. We can see as below:


1\. Using IE browser to access the http://localhost:8080/portal.

2. Login by an advanced user.

3. In the User Workspace, access *Exo Start* -> select *Administration* -> *Advanced* --> *Manage Pages*.

 The form to manage pages will be displayed:

 !F15.png! 

4. Click the !F16.gif! icon to add a new page.

5. Click the !F17.gif! icon to edit a page.

6. Click the !F18.gif! icon to delete a page.
